  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:natecaji/pic3129</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:natecaji/pic3129</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Paprike</string>
            <string language="en">Bell peppers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grüner Pfeffer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paprikas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pimentas de Bell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Peperoni dolci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιπέρια κουδουνιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paprikas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Paprika (Capsicum annuum) izvira iz Amerike, v Evropo pa so jo prinesli Kolumbovi mornarji. Plodovi paprike so različnih barv; od rumenkaste, zelene do temno rdeče. Paprika vsebuje veliko vitamina C in betakarotena.</string>
            <string language="en">Bell pepper (Capsicum annuum) in native to America and was brought to Europe by Columbus sailors. The fruit comes in variety of colors: from yellow, green to red. It contains a lot of vitamin C and beta-carotene.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">paprika</string>
            <string language="en">bell pepper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zelenjava</string>
            <string language="en">vegetables</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hrana</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grüner Pfeffer (der spanische Pfeffer Annuum) im
Eingeborenen nach Amerika und wurde zu Europa von den Columbus 
Seeleuten geholt. Die Frucht kommt in Vielzahl von Farben: 
vom Gelb grün zum Rot. Es enthält eine Menge Vitamin C 
und Beta-Carotin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le paprika (poivron annuum) dans l'indigène vers
l'Amérique et a été apporté à l'Europe par des marins de 
Columbus. Le fruit vient dans la variété de couleurs : 
du jaune, vert au rouge. Il contient beaucoup de vitamine 
C et de bêta-carotène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pimenta de Bell (capsicum annuum) no nativo a 
América e foi trazida a Europa por sailors de Columbo. A fruta 
vem na variedade das cores: do amarelo, verde ao vermelho. 
Contem muitos da vitamina C e do beta-carotene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il peperone dolce (capsico annuum) in nativo in 
America ed è stato portato ad Europa dai marinai de Columbus. 
La frutta viene nella varietà di colori: da colore 
giallo, verde a colore rosso. Contiene la vitamina C molto 
ed il beta-carotene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πιπέρι κουδουνιών (καψικό annuum) στον ντόπιο 
στην Αμερική και παρουσιάστηκε στην Ευρώπη από τους ναυτικούς του
Columbus. Τα φρούτα έρχονται στην ποικιλία των χρωμάτων: 
από κίτρινο, πράσινος στο κόκκινο. Περιέχει πολλές 
βιταμίνη C και βήτα-καροτίνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El paprika (pimiento annuum) en natural a 
América y fue traído a Europa por los marineros de Columbus. 
La fruta viene en la variedad de colores: del amarillo, 
verde al rojo. Contiene muchos de la vitamina C y del 
betacaroteno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grüner Pfeffer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gemüse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nahrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">paprika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">légumes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nourriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pimenta de sino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">peperone dolce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">verdure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">alimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
